column4: OK Azzmodan here is my problem:  I''m trying to Remote Desktop form Ubuntu to WinXP using Hamachi.  I'm using the Terminal Server Client, but i'm getting a connection error
Do I have to enable remote desktop in Ubuntu if I'm going from Ubuntu to windows?
Azz, YesI have UltraVNC server installed and tested with another XP machine
works perfect using rdesktop ... thats how I access the windows machines.. I use RDP though
